name: European Association of Faculties of Pharmacy
membership: EAFP is a member of the International Pharmaceutical Federation (FIP, www.fip.org). FIP is the global federation representing three million pharmacists and pharmaceutical scientists worldwide.
memberOrga:
EAFP represents institutions (departments, faculties, schools) involved in Pharmacy Education and Training. Current membership is listed on the website:
http://eafponline.eu/about/membership/
goal: The European Association of Faculties of Pharmacy represents higher education institutions delivering pharmacy education and training in Europe.
interests: Education, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
